divs: Sighting Details At app. 4am I and 3 friends observed 3 pinpointobjects hovering in the myrtle beach area. They were emitting light that variedred, white, green, and blue. They were at a high altitude. One was north of ourlocation, one was north east, and the other was south west. The objects seemedto stay in the same position, but wobbled from left to righ continuously. Weobserved this for nearly one hour.
trends: There have been 52 other sightings in Myrtle Beach
There were no other sightings in Myrtle Beach on or around August 6th 2002
Summary: I saw 3 pinpoint objects hovering at a high altitu
